summary: A suite of grapheme‑to‑phoneme (G2P) model implementations for NeMo’s text‑to‑speech pipeline, offering a common abstract interface and concrete models based on CTC, T5, ARPAbet, IPA, and Chinese pinyin, together with utilities for tokenization, heteronym disambiguation, training, inference and model export across multiple languages.
business_intent: Provide developers with ready‑to‑use, extensible G2P components that convert written text into phoneme sequences, improving pronunciation accuracy and multilingual support in speech synthesis products.
